dict.acceptation: 衣领；领子；（狗等的）项圈；（管子或机器部件的）圈；
抓住，逮住；扭住领口；拉用，扯用；给…套上颈圈；

sent.orig: Worker of white-collar worker white-collar is blue collar worker symmetrical.
sent.trans: 白领工人白领工人是“蓝领工人”的对称。

sent.orig: Worker of blue collar of blue collar worker is the symmetry of white-collar worker.
sent.trans: 蓝领工人蓝领工人是白领工人的对称。

sent.orig: There are lapel collar, stand-collar, no collar and other forms.
sent.trans: 衣领主要有翻领、立领、无领等形式。

sent.orig: Small circular collar stand-collar suit as beautiful but more protective.
sent.trans: 圆形小立领不如西装领美观但防护性更强。

sent.orig: Four pieces of pair Sticking collar reinforcement and collar smoothly, curve keep smocthly.
sent.trans: 一双四片贴时反口补强与反口平齐，弧度要平顺。
